results.content:
The topics are simple but explained bright enough to get a complete understanding. The final project at the end is a perfect way to get all the pieces together and clarify any doubts about the way RactiveJS works. 

Just be careful with the topic "Working with Events" it seems that the order is incorrect, get the correct order looking at the presentation.
